entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 13.
